Text: The Willy Wonka Candy Company:  In 1988 the Willy Wonka Candy Company brand – then owned by Sunmark Corporation – was acquired by Nestlé.
Triplets:<The Willy Wonka Candy Company

Text: The Willy Wonka Candy Company:  Nestlé sells sweets and chocolate under the Willy Wonka brand name in the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, the Republic of Ireland, Australia, New Zealand, Japan, South Africa, Mexico, Colombia, Brazil, Argentina, Costa Rica, Panama, Dominican Republic and the Middle East.
Triplets:<Nestle

Text: The Willy Wonka Candy Company:  In mid-2015 the Willy Wonka brand name was dropped by Nestlé, in favour of special "throwback" packaging.
Triplets:<The Willy Wonka Candy Company

--------------------
Text: The Willy Wonka Candy Company:  Candies previously made by the Willy Wonka brand are now under the Nestlé brand naming, excluding the Wonka brand name on the top left corner.
